Minister.Text: Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness (s. 2); Minister of Emergency Management and Community Resilience for the purposes of section 7 (SI/2025-80)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2007, c. 15, s. 12 in force on assent 22.06.2007; ss. 1 to 11 and s. 13 in force 03.08.2007 see SI/2007-79
